comment.author: 79583367@N02
comment._content: Wow !  I haven't seen a pic of this vehicle before.  It is obviously Sydney, Australia, and the tram is a "P" type of that system.  It would be nice if someone could identify the location.  It is a major junction, judging by all the tramway poles (with the little caps) and all the wire !  I'll have a guess and suggest corner of Alison Road and Darley Road, Randwick, at the entrance to the tramway workshops.
